DocAttribute.Name: PredefinedType
DocAttribute.Documentation: Selects a predefined type for the load group. It can be differentiated between load groups, load cases, load combinations, or userdefined grouping levels.

DocAttribute.Name: ActionType
DocAttribute.Documentation: Type of actions in the group. Normally needed if 'PredefinedType' specifies a LOAD_CASE.

DocAttribute.Name: ActionSource
DocAttribute.Documentation: Source of actions in the group. Normally needed if 'PredefinedType' specifies a LOAD_CASE.

DocAttribute.Name: Coefficient
DocAttribute.Documentation: Load factor. If omitted, a factor is not yet known or not specified. A load factor of 1.0 shall be explicitly exported as Coefficient = 1.0.

DocAttribute.Name: Purpose
DocAttribute.Documentation: Description of the purpose of this instance. Among else, possible values of the Purpose of load combinations are 'SLS', 'ULS', 'ALS' to indicate serviceability, ultimate, or accidental limit state.

DocAttribute.Name: SourceOfResultGroup
DocAttribute.Documentation: Results which were computed using this load group.

DocAttribute.Name: LoadGroupFor
DocAttribute.Documentation: Analysis models in which this load group is used.

DocWhereRule.Name: HasObjectType
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The attribute ObjectType shall be given if the predefined type, action type, or action source is set to USERDEFINED.
DocWhereRule.Expression: ( (PredefinedType <> IfcLoadGroupTypeEnum.USERDEFINED) AND (ActionType <> IfcActionTypeEnum.USERDEFINED) AND (ActionSource <> IfcActionSourceTypeEnum.USERDEFINED) ) OR EXISTS(SELF\IfcObject.ObjectType)
